name: Total Student Count
description: The complete number of students enrolled in the current academic year.

name: Academic Achievers
description: A list of students who have excelled with the highest marks.

name: Academic Deficiencies
description: A summary of students who did not pass their exams or meet the required academic standards.

name: Faculty
description: The total number of professors and faculty members at the institution.

name: College Success Rate
description: The overall success rate of the college based on student performance and pass rates.

name: Financial Budget
description: A detailed look at the college's annual budget and expenditure plan.

name: Fee Income
description: The total revenue collected from student fees during the academic period.

name: Course Catalog
description: A list of all the academic programs and courses offered by the college.
